## `SetLongGradeScaleFormat`

Sets whether to display test scores in long format.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetLongGradeScaleFormat(boolean longFormat)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`boolean` longFormat | `true` to display test scores in long format. |
